text: I really need to play the NMH games. Would you suggest the Wii or PS3 versions?
author: Aegis29

text: I would suggest the Wii versions, the second game was only released on the Wii. As for the first game many argue that the original's art design was better displayed on the Wii, also the framerate is better compared to the PS3 version, although I don't mind the PS3 version myself.

author: David En Ren

text: The NMH series sure had some style, as is the norm with Suda51 games. The gameplay itself was also quite rewarding, though I did struggle sometimes with the Wiimote controls. Oh, and I still know the lyrics of Philistine (other NMH2 upload in the list) perfectly, catchy tune! Speaking of Suda51, his first game 'The Silver Case' was just ported, translated and released on Steam. I'm excited to play it.
